00021 function seedGaugeKML($dom, $gaugesnode, $endtime, $debug, $startdelta, $dbfilename, $column, $name, $min, $max, $ox, $oy, $sx, $sy) {
00022         $overlayNode = $dom->createElement('ScreenOverlay');
00023         $nameNode = $dom->createElement('name', $name);
00024         $overlayNode->appendChild($nameNode);
00025         
00026         $overlayXYNode = $dom->createElement('overlayXY');
00027         $overlayXYNode->setAttribute('x', $ox);
00028         $overlayXYNode->setAttribute('y', $oy);
00029         $overlayXYNode->setAttribute('xunits', 'fraction');
00030         $overlayXYNode->setAttribute('yunits', 'fraction');
00031         $overlayNode->appendChild($overlayXYNode);
00032         
00033         $screenXYNode = $dom->createElement('screenXY');
00034         $screenXYNode->setAttribute('x', $sx);
00035         $screenXYNode->setAttribute('y', $sy);
00036         $screenXYNode->setAttribute('xunits', 'fraction');
00037         $screenXYNode->setAttribute('yunits', 'fraction');
00038         $overlayNode->appendChild($screenXYNode);
00039         
00040         $sizeXYNode = $dom->createElement('size');
00041         $sizeXYNode->setAttribute('x', "0.15");
00042         $sizeXYNode->setAttribute('y', "0.15");
00043         $sizeXYNode->setAttribute('xunits', 'fraction');
00044         $sizeXYNode->setAttribute('yunits', 'fraction');
00045         $overlayNode->appendChild($sizeXYNode);
00046         
00047         
00048         $iconNode = $dom->createElement('Icon');
00049         $gaugedelta = time() - $endtime;
00050         $gaugeurl = "http://" . $_SERVER['SERVER_NAME'] .
00051                 dirname(filter_var($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'], FILTER_SANITIZE_STRING)) .
00052                 '/gauge.php' .
00053                 "?startdelta=$startdelta" . "&" .
00054                 "dbfilename=$dbfilename" . "&" .
00055                 "datacolumn=$column" . "&" .
00056                 "datamin=$min" . "&" .
00057                 "datamax=$max" . "&" .
00058                 "dataname=$name" . "&" .
00059                 "debug=$debug";
00060 
00061         $hrefNode = $dom->createElement('href');
00062         $urlNode = $dom->createCDATASection($gaugeurl);
00063         $hrefNode->appendChild($urlNode);
00064 
00065         $iconNode->appendChild($hrefNode);
00066         $overlayNode->appendChild($iconNode);
00067         $gaugesnode->appendChild($overlayNode);
00068 
00069 }
00070 
00071 ?>
